text: Well, I would assume you did know better and just decided to do it anyway.

speaker: C
text: You know, anyway. All right, well, we can get into that another time, because I'm, you know, I need to up my cannabis knowledge, and you're just the guy.

text: Turns out I know a guy that's gonna do it for us. Thanks for hanging out, talking canadian tv. Who knows what we'll get into on Friday? No show on Wednesday. Until next time, keep the mic hot.
